headline: A Look At Costco (COST) Valuation After Mizuho Upgrade And Renewed Growth Optimism
summary: Mizuho’s decision to upgrade Costco Wholesale (COST) to Outperform and place it on its Top Picks list has pushed the stock back into focus for investors watching membership trends and comparable sales. See our latest analysis for Costco Wholesale. At a share price of US$889.10, Costco has seen momentum start to rebuild, with a 1.53% 1 day and 2.71% 7 day share price return. The 1 year total shareholder return of 3% contrasts with very large 3 and 5 year total shareholder return multiples of...
